Posts.Content: Jan 9, 2013 06:04PM nanna5 wrote: I want to thank you all for your kind words.  My Children are 36 and 33 years old. Lemon, your boys will give you the strenght you need to fight this with all you have. Hugs to everyone, Thank you for this wonderfull site.
Posts.Title: Just Diagnosed today nanna5 mrenee68

Posts.Content: nanna5 wrote: Radiologist called and said the biopsy came back Low grade IDC. Wants me to call my surgeon to make an appointment. I sat in the dark and cried. I quess I have a long road ahead of me. My children are asking me questions, that I have no answer to give them. Low grade sounds like it is not so bad, Im I right or just hopeful thinking? Connie Dx 1/10/2013, IDC, <1cm, Stage IA, Grade 2, 0/4 nodes, ER+/PR-, HER2- Surgery 2/7/2013 Lumpectomy: Left; Lymph node removal: Left, Sentinel Radiation Therapy 3/6/2013 Breast Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: nanna5 wrote: I am so happy I found this site. I am having a biospy done today. Mammogram shows a suspicious nodule with irregular margin bordering the retroglandular fat. Does anyone know what retroglandular fat is?
